title: Tekkon Kinkreet (Tekkonkinkreet)
synopsis: The streets of Treasure Town are said to belong to "The Cats." They know everything that goes on in the city, and no one can stir up trouble without going through them first. In reality, The Cats are a pair of orphan boys called Black and White, who arenâ€™t afraid of anything or anyone.
